EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF & vCloudAir_Q414.Thank you - Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending: Supercharge Your Application Delivery Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for attending last week's webinar Supercharge Your Application Delivery with Pivotal and VMware <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/10x-improvement-in-server-to-admin-ratios>.
Consider registering for our next cloud platform webinar, which takes place on November 18th at 10 AM PDT, Made for Each Other: Microservices + PaaS <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/microservices-and-paas-a-match-made-in-the-cloud>.
Weâ€™d like to take this opportunity to share a few of the questions and answers that were addressed during the webinar:
- Q: What tools or services are available to help customers migrate development platforms to Pivotal CF?
- A: A key benefit of Pivotal CF's buildpack approach is that it allows the product to support a wide range of application languages, frameworks, runtimes and components. To learn about buildpacks, start here: http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/buildpacks/ <http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/buildpacks/>
- Q: Where can I get a hold of virtual machine .ova file to start working with Pivotal CF?
- A. You can download Pivotal CF from Pivotal Network: https://network.pivotal.io/products/pivotal-cf <https://network.pivotal.io/products/pivotal-cf>. Look for the file called, "Pivotal CF for vSphere All-In-One Download"
Learn more:
- Come see Pivotal at the Cloud Platform Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow> at a location near you - Read more about VMware vCloud Air <http://vcloud.vmware.com/> - Subscribe to All Things Pivotal <http://pivotal.io/podcasts> podcast
Thank you for joining us,
The Pivotal Team
